alert.note: Alert for Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 5:04PM EDT until September 08 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lanier County in south central Georgia... Central Lowndes County in south central Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 504 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moody Air Force Base, or 9 miles east of Valdosta, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Dasher, Naylor, Greenwood, Barretts, Valdosta Regional Airport, and Stockton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
